attributes.action: Change the National Anthem from God Save The King to 'Good Enough' by Dodgy.
attributes.additional_details:
The lyrics to God Save the King are no longer relevant to a deeply divided country.  Whereas;
"If it's good enough for you, it's good enough for me
It's good enough for two, it's what I want to see
If it's good enough for you, it's good enough for me
It's good enough for two, it's what I want to see"
Will bring people together in love and harmony.
attributes.background: Change the National Anthem from God Save The King to 'Good Enough' by 90s Britpoppers, Dodgy.

rejection.details:
The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
